export.title: Export Data
export.description: Export data as a JSON file for backup
export.fullBackupDescription: Export all account data and user settings, recommended for full backup
export.accountDataDescription: Only export account information and related data
export.userSettingsDescription: Only export interface settings and preference configurations

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Restore data from a backup file
import.pasteJsonData: Paste JSON data or import via the file selector above...
import.dataInvalid: Data format error, please check JSON format
import.selectFileImport: Please select file or input data to import
import.formatError: Data format error, please check JSON format

notice.importWarning1: Imported data will overwrite existing data of the same type, please operate with caution
notice.importWarning2: It is recommended to export current data for backup before importing
notice.importWarning3: Only supports JSON format files exported by this extension
notice.importWarning4: Imported account data contains sensitive information, please ensure the file source is trustworthy

webdav.title: WebDAV Backup and Sync
webdav.configDesc: Configure WebDAV and upload/download backup files
webdav.webdavUrlExample: For example: https://dav.example.com/{{filename}} full file URL or Webdav root directory URL

autoSync.title: WebDAV Auto Sync
autoSync.description: Configure automatic sync to periodically back up and restore data
autoSync.enableDesc: When enabled, data will be automatically synchronized to WebDAV at set intervals.
autoSync.intervalDesc: Set how often the automatic sync runs
autoSync.strategyDesc: Choose how data should be synchronized
autoSync.strategyMerge: Smart merge - merge local and remote data based on timestamps
autoSync.strategyLocalFirst: Local first - local data overrides remote data
autoSync.strategyRemoteFirst: Remote first - remote data overwrites local data
